verses.verse: Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for he is <S%H2896>good,<s%> for his loving <S%H2896>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
Let the <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> by <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H1350>so,<s%> whom he has redeemed from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6862>adversary,<s%>
And <S%H6908>gathered<s%> out of the <S%H776>lands,<s%> from the <S%H4217>east<s%> and from the <S%H4628>west,<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%> and from the <S%H3220>south.<s%>
They <S%H8582>wandered<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> in a <S%H3452>desert<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%> They <S%H4672>found<s%> no <S%H5892>city<s%> to live <S%H4186>in.<s%>
<S%H7457>Hungry<s%> and <S%H6771>thirsty,<s%> their <S%H5315>soul<s%> fainted in <S%H5848>them.<s%>
Then they <S%H6817>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble,<s%> and he <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of their <S%H4691>distresses,<s%>
he <S%H1869>led<s%> them also by a <S%H3477>straight<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> that they might <S%H3212>go<s%> to a <S%H5892>city<s%> to live <S%H4186>in.<s%>
Let them <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> for his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
For he <S%H7646>satisfies<s%> the <S%H8264>longing<s%> <S%H5315>soul.<s%> He <S%H4390>fills<s%> the <S%H7457>hungry<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H2896>good.<s%>
Some <S%H3427>sat<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and in the shadow of <S%H6757>death,<s%> being <S%H615>bound<s%> in <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and <S%H1270>iron,<s%>
because they <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H410>God,<s%> and condemned the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the Most <S%H5945>High.<s%>
Therefore he brought <S%H3665>down<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> with <S%H5999>labor.<s%> They fell <S%H3782>down,<s%> and there was none to <S%H5826>help.<s%>
Then they <S%H2199>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble,<s%> and he <S%H3467>saved<s%> them out of their <S%H4691>distresses.<s%>
He brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and the shadow of <S%H6757>death,<s%> and <S%H5423>broke<s%> their <S%H4147>bonds<s%> in <S%H5423>sunder.<s%>
Let them <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> for his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
For he has <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H1817>gates<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and <S%H1438>cut<s%> <S%H1438>through<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H1270>iron.<s%>
<S%H191>Fools<s%> are <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> <S%H1870>because<s%> of their <S%H6588>disobedience,<s%> and because of their <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>
Their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8581>abhors<s%> all kinds of <S%H400>food.<s%> They draw <S%H5060>near<s%> to the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>
Then they <S%H2199>cry<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble,<s%> he <S%H3467>saves<s%> them out of their <S%H4691>distresses.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sends<s%> his <S%H1697>word,<s%> and <S%H7495>heals<s%> <S%H4422>them,<s%> and delivers them from their <S%H7825>graves.<s%>
Let them <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> for his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
Let them offer the <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> and <S%H5608>declare<s%> his <S%H4639>works<s%> with <S%H7440>singing.<s%>
Those who go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> in <S%H591>ships,<s%> who <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4399>business<s%> in <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters;<s%>
These <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4639>works,<s%> and his <S%H6381>wonders<s%> in the <S%H4688>deep.<s%>
For he <S%H559>commands,<s%> and <S%H5975>raises<s%> the <S%H5591>stormy<s%> <S%H7307>wind,<s%> which lifts <S%H7311>up<s%> its <S%H1530>waves.<s%>
They mount <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H8064>sky;<s%> they go <S%H3381>down<s%> again to the <S%H8415>depths.<s%> Their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H4127>melts<s%> away because of <S%H7451>trouble.<s%>
They reel back and <S%H2287>forth,<s%> and <S%H5128>stagger<s%> like a drunken <S%H7910>man,<s%> and are at their <S%H2451>wits<s%>' <S%H1104>end.<s%>
Then they <S%H6817>cry<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble,<s%> and he brings them <S%H3318>out<s%> of their <S%H4691>distress.<s%>
He <S%H6965>makes<s%> the <S%H5591>storm<s%> a <S%H1827>calm,<s%> so that its <S%H1530>waves<s%> are <S%H2814>still.<s%>
Then they are <S%H8055>glad<s%> because it is <S%H8367>calm,<s%> so he <S%H5148>brings<s%> them to their <S%H2656>desired<s%> <S%H4231>haven.<s%>
Let them <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> for his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
Let them <S%H7311>exalt<s%> him also in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1984>praise<s%> him in the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders.<s%>
He <S%H7760>turns<s%> <S%H5104>rivers<s%> into a <S%H4057>desert,<s%> water <S%H4325>springs<s%> into a thirsty <S%H6774>ground,<s%>
and a <S%H6529>fruitful<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> into a <S%H4420>salt<s%> <S%H7451>waste,<s%> for the wickedness of those who dwell in <S%H3427>it.<s%>
He <S%H7760>turns<s%> a <S%H4057>desert<s%> into a <S%H98>pool<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> and a <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> into water <S%H4325>springs.<s%>
There he makes the <S%H7457>hungry<s%> <S%H3427>live,<s%> that they may <S%H3559>prepare<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> to live <S%H4186>in,<s%>
<S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H7704>fields,<s%> <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H6213>reap<s%> the <S%H6529>fruits<s%> of <S%H8393>increase.<s%>
He <S%H1288>blesses<s%> them <S%H7235>also,<s%> so that they are multiplied <S%H3966>greatly.<s%> He <S%H4591>doesn't<s%> allow their <S%H929>livestock<s%> to <S%H4591>decrease.<s%>
<S%H4591>Again,<s%> they are diminished and bowed <S%H7817>down<s%> through <S%H6115>oppression,<s%> <S%H7451>trouble,<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow.<s%>
He <S%H8210>pours<s%> <S%H937>contempt<s%> on <S%H5081>princes,<s%> and causes them to <S%H8582>wander<s%> in a <S%H1870>trackless<s%> <S%H8414>waste.<s%>
Yet he lifts the <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H7682>out<s%> of their <S%H6040>affliction,<s%> and <S%H7760>increases<s%> their <S%H4940>families<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock.<s%>
The <S%H3477>upright<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H8055>it,<s%> and be glad. All the <S%H5766>wicked<s%> will <S%H7092>shut<s%> their <S%H6310>mouths.<s%>
Whoever is <S%H2450>wise<s%> will pay <S%H8104>attention<s%> to these <S%H995>things.<s%> They will consider the loving <S%H2617>kindnesses<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
